commit_scope: Keep --dangerously-skip-permissions for autonomous host-runner commands while demoting root execution to a safe non-root account; avoid low-UID system-user selection and keep gate ownership/waiver metadata current.

phase_gate.blocked_reason: Awaiting branch push/PR checks and production host-runner smoke that verifies claude/codex/cursor execution claims under non-root demotion policy.

e2e_validation.expected_behavior_delta: When a root host-runner receives a command containing --dangerously-skip-permissions, the command keeps the flag but is executed as a non-root user with UID >= AGENT_RUN_AS_MIN_UID (default 1000), preventing low-UID system-user demotion.
test_flows: Create a claude task that includes --dangerously-skip-permissions and verify task context contains runner_exec_user with non-root UID >= 1000.
Create a codex task and verify completion from railway-runner without runner_exec_user_unavailable.
Create a cursor task and verify claim path succeeds and failures, if any, are auth/token related rather than binary/root rejection.
